episodes.title: RuPocalypse Now!
episodes.plot: Season 4 premieres with 13 new queens competing to become America's Next Drag Superstar, but first they must survive drag zombies and the end of the world.

episodes.title: WTF!: Wrestling's Trashiest Fighters
episodes.plot: The dolls enter the world of ladies wrestling as the competition moves to the ring.

episodes.title: Glamazons vs. Champions
episodes.plot: The queens team up to create commercials for RuPaul's albums Glamazon & Champion.

episodes.title: Queens Behind Bars
episodes.plot: The dolls go to jail when they star in a sitcom acting challenge, "Hot in Tuckaho, " coached by "Will & Grace" co-creator Max Mutchnick.

episodes.title: Snatch Game
episodes.plot: The queens compete in a star-studded TV game show featuring their most fabulous & funny celebrity impersonations. With extra special guest judges comedian Ross Mathews & original Dreamgirl Loretta Devine.

episodes.title: Float Your Boat
episodes.plot: The dolls design ship-shaped parade floats for a pride-filled runway extravaganza. With extra special guest judges Kelly Osbourne and NCIS' Pauley Perrette.

episodes.title: Dragazines
episodes.plot: The queens turn the publishing industry on its wig as they launch their own magazines. With Extra special guest judges actress Regina King and country legend Pam Tillis.

episodes.title: Frenemies
episodes.plot: Paired up with their best "frenemies," the dolls struggle through their differences to pull off live runway duets.

episodes.title: Frock the Vote!
episodes.plot: The queens campaign and debate as they vie to become the 2012 Wig Party candidate.

episodes.title: DILFs: Dads I'd Like to Frock
episodes.plot: The queens are paired up with sexy dads for a drag runway makeover. With extra special guest judges Jesse Tyler Ferguson & Jennifer Love Hewitt.

episodes.title: The Fabulous B*tch Ball
episodes.plot: The race goes to the dogs, when the queens compete in a pageant of canine inspired couture. With extra special guest judges Wynonna Judd and Rose McGowan.

episodes.title: RuPaul Rewind
episodes.plot: A look back on the highlights, low-lights, and previously unseen footage from season four.

episodes.title: The Final Three
episodes.plot: The competition reaches epic proportions as the top 3 queens compete in their final challenge starring in the music video for RuPaul's hit Glamazon. With choreographer Candis Cayne.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: RuPaul and the contestants of season four return for the annual reunion. For the first time, a live audience of fans are present.
